Nightstrike:::

"IF YOU DON'T STOP TO CALL ME CONDOR, I WON'T ANSWER ANY OF YOUR 
QUESTIONS, YOU GET IT!!!!"roared Nightstrike"I'm not weak... I don't 
like to be weak, ruled by stupid and opressive honor code... "he 
added with sarcasm "Haven't you noticed that a smart decepticon can 
play using your honor??? that happened before, remeber the great war, 
remember Galvatron... I din't loose power as Decepticon, I'm 
here 'cause I liked chew over to ponder... and you must know that I'm 
not afraid to my doom...I'm not coward... "



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Keeping his eyes closed, AzureBlade warned the other maximals.
> 
> AzureBlade: He is trying to wake up, but not as Condor. Sedate him 
> again if you can, and be ready if it doesn't work.
> 
> Then, back to Nightstrike...
> 
> AzureBlade: Why deny who you are, Condor? And how do you explain 
that 
> we maximals captured you even with our code of honor? You have lost 
> power as a decepticon, Condor. It is now up to you to know if you 
want 
> to regain it. However, you must know that remaining a Decepticon 
will 
> spell your doom.
>
